\newcommand{\CONSOLE}[1]%
  {
  \typeout{}
  \typeout{--> #1}
  }

\newcommand{\PROMPT}[1]%
  {
  \CONSOLE{#1}
  \typein[\$]{Press Enter to continue:}
  }

\newcommand{\ABORT}[1]%
  {
  \CONSOLE{#1 -- Aborting.}
  \stop
  }

\newdateformat{yyyymmdd}{\THEYEAR-\twodigit{\THEMONTH}-\twodigit{\THEDAY}}
\yyyymmdd

%Boolean short cut
\newcommand{\Bool}[2]{%
  \newboolean{#1}
  \setboolean{#1}{#2}
  }

% TOC dimensions
\setlength{\cftparskip}{0.1in}
\setlength{\cftsecnumwidth}{0.2in}
\setlength{\cftsecindent}{0.0in}
\setlength{\cftsubsecnumwidth}{0.4in}
\setlength{\cftsubsecindent}{0.2in}
\setlength{\cftsubsubsecnumwidth}{0.6in}
\setlength{\cftsubsubsecindent}{0.6in}
\setlength{\cftfignumwidth}{0.6in}
\setlength{\cfttabnumwidth}{0.6in}

%A or An?
%------------------------------------------------------------------------
\makeatletter
\newcommand\AOrAn[1]{%
  a%
  \@for\@vowel:=a,e,i,o,u,y,A,E,I,O,U,Y\do{%
    \expandafter\ifx\@vowel#1%
      n%
    \fi
  } % keep this space
  #1%
}
\makeatother

\makeatletter
\def\SetWatermarkMessage#1{
  \AddToShipoutPicture{%
    \setlength{\@tempdimb}{.5\paperwidth}%
    \setlength{\@tempdimc}{.5\paperheight}%
    \setlength{\unitlength}{1pt}%
    \put(\strip@pt\@tempdimb,\strip@pt\@tempdimc){%
      \makebox(0,0){\rotatebox{45}{\textcolor[gray]{0.85}%
      {\fontsize{6cm}{6cm}\selectfont{#1}}}}%
      }%
  }
}
\makeatother

%%PAGE COMPOSITION

\setlength{\headheight}{15pt}

\setlength{\columnsep}{0.5in}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}
  {
  0.000in
  }

\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}
  {
  0.0001in
  }

\ifx\doDraft\yesWord
  \gdef\mylhead{\textcolor{red}{DRAFT}}
\else
  \gdef\mylhead{}
\fi

\setlength{\unitlength}{1in}

\gdef\mylfoot%
  {
  \ifx\lastPage\yesWord
    % any last-page specific footers
  \fi
  }
\lfoot{\mylfoot}

\gdef\mychead{}
\chead{\mychead{}}

\gdef\mycfoot{}
\cfoot{\mycfoot{}}

\setlength{\unitlength}{1in}
\def\CVLogo%
  {%
  \begin{picture}(0,0)
    \put(+0.35,0.00){\href{https://cam-view.com/}{\includegraphics[width=0.6in]{cam-view-large.png}}}
  \end{picture}
  }

\def\MyBrandTitle%
  {%
  \ifx\firstPage\yesWord
    \CVLogo{}
    \gdef\firstPage{no}
  \else
    \MyTitle{}
  \fi
  }

\gdef\myrhead{} % \MyBrandTitle{}}
\rhead{\myrhead{}}

\gdef\myrfoot%
  {
  \ifx\lastPage\yesWord
    \setlength{\unitlength}{1in}
    \begin{picture}(0,0)
      \put(-2.85,-0.59){{\scriptsize Date: \MyDate{}~|~\yyyymmdd\today}}
      \put(-1.25,-0.59){{\scriptsize File: \parbox[t]{5.0in}{\raggedright\scriptsize\MyPath{}}}}
    \end{picture}
  \else
    \ifx\Copyright\yesWord
      {\small \copyright{} 2020 \CVLONG{}.  All rights reserved.}
    \fi
    \hspace{0.5in}
    \PageNum{}
  \fi
  }
\rfoot{\myrfoot}

\setlength{\unitlength}{0.5in}
\def\IndentBox#1#2#3#4
  {
  \begin{picture}(0,0)
    \put(#1,#2){\makebox(0,0)[#3]{#4}}
  \end{picture}
  }

\ifx\PageCount\yesWord
  \def\PageNum{\thepage~/~\pageref{last-page}}
\else
  \def\PageNum{\thepage}
\fi

\CONSOLE{lastpage}
\def\LastPage%
  {%
  \vspace{-0.5in}%
  \paragraph*{}\label{last-page}%
  \def\lastPage{yes}%
  \def\lastPageEmpty{no}%
  \renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.000in}%
  }

\def\LastPageEmpty%
  {%
  %\paragraph*{}
  \label{last-page}%
  \def\lastPage{yes}%
  \def\lastPageEmpty{yes}%
  \renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.000in}%
  }

\newlength{\oldrowheight}

%-----------------------------------------------

\makeatletter
\newcommand\BackgroundPicture[3]{
  \setlength{\unitlength}{1pt}
   \put(0,\strip@pt\paperheight){
    \parbox[t][\paperheight]{\paperwidth}{
     \vfill
      \centering\includegraphics[width=#2,angle=#3]{#1}
     \vfill
      }
    }
  }
\makeatother

\newcommand{\MarkDocumentAsDraft}%
  {%
  \AddToShipoutPicture{\BackgroundPicture{draft.png}{4in}{0}}
  }

\definecolor{ColorSectionText}{rgb}{.3,.25,.48}
\definecolor{ColorHitachiRed}{rgb}{0.9882,0,0.0781}

\definecolor{ColorTableTitleRowBackground}{rgb}{0.15,0.55,0.55}
\definecolor{ColorTableTitleRowForeground}{rgb}{1,1,1}
\definecolor{ColorTableSubTitleRowBackground}{rgb}{0.7874,0.7874,0.8784}
\definecolor{ColorTableRowBackground}{rgb}{0.8784,0.8784,0.8784}
\definecolor{ColorTableBase}{rgb}{.98,.98,.99}
\definecolor{ColorTableWhite}{rgb}{1,1,1}

%-----------------------------------------------
%{Page margins}
\ifx\ISOPaper\yesWord
  \usepackage{vmargin}
  \setpapersize{A4}
  \setmarginsrb{35mm}{20mm}{25mm}{15mm}{12pt}{11mm}{0pt}{11mm}
\fi

\ifx\landscapeDoc\yesWord
  \ifx\ISOPaper\yesWord
  % 8.26 x 11.69
    \textheight=6.20in
    \textwidth=9.19in
    \oddsidemargin=1.0in
    \evensidemargin=1.0in
    \topmargin=0.75in
  \else
    \textheight=6.50in
    \textwidth=9.45in
    \oddsidemargin=-0.25in %-0.25in
    \evensidemargin=-0.25in %-0.25in
    \topmargin=-0.25in
  \fi
\else % portrait mode.
  \ifx\ISOPaper\yesWord
  % 8.26 x 11.69
    \textwidth=6.20in
    \textheight=9.19in
    \oddsidemargin=1.0in
    \evensidemargin=1.0in
    \topmargin=0.75in
  \else % letter size, portrait
    \ifx\CustomPaperSize\yesWord
      \textwidth=\customtextwidth
      \textheight=\customtextheight
      \oddsidemargin=\customleftmargin
      \evensidemargin=\customleftmargin
      \topmargin=-\customtopmargin
    \else
      \textwidth=6.50in
      \textheight=8.5in
      \oddsidemargin=0in %-0.25in
      \evensidemargin=0in %-0.25in
      \topmargin=-0.25in
    \fi
  \fi
\fi
\parskip=0.15in
\parindent=0in

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%--SPECIAL PARAGRAPH FORMATTING
%{Paragraphs and lists}


\def\myline{\rule{\linewidth}{0.05in}}
\def\bx#1{\framebox[#1in][]{\rule{0in}{0.10in}}}
\def\sp{\vspace{0.2in}}
\def\U#1{$\underline{\mbox{#1}}$}
\def\O#1{$\overline{\mbox{#1}}$}
\def\BI{\protect\begin{itemize}}
\def\BIS{\protect\begin{itemize}\itemsep=-\parskip}
\def\BIZ{\mbox{}\vspace{-\baselineskip}\protect\begin{itemize}\itemsep=-\parskip}
\def\BIT{%
  \vspace{-0.25in}%
  \protect\begin{list}{$\bullet$}{%
    \setlength{\itemsep}{0.0in}%
    \setlength{\labelsep}{0.1in}%
    \setlength{\labelwidth}{0.1in}%
    \setlength{\leftmargin}{0.2in}%
    \setlength{\parsep}{0.00in}%
    \setlength{\parskip}{0.10in}%
    \setlength{\partopsep}{0.00in}%
    \setlength{\rightmargin}{0in}%
    \setlength{\topsep}{0.00in}%
    }%
  }
\def\EIT{%
  \protect\end{list}%
  \vspace{-0.15in}%
  \mbox{}%
  }
\def\EI{\protect\end{itemize}}
\def\EIS{\protect\end{itemize}}
\def\BD{\protect\begin{description}}
\def\BDS{\protect\begin{description}\itemsep=-\parskip}
\def\ED{\protect\end{description}}
\def\BE{\protect\begin{enumerate}}
\def\BES{\protect\begin{enumerate}\itemsep=-\parskip}
\def\BEZ{\mbox{}\vspace{-\baselineskip}\protect\begin{enumerate}\itemsep=-\parskip}
\def\EE{\protect\end{enumerate}}
\def\I{\protect\item\mbox{}}
\def\check{$\surd$}
\def\TM{\textsuperscript{\texttrademark}}
\def\subsubsubsection#1{~\linebreak{}{\color{ColorSectionText}#1}\\\vspace{-0.25in}}
\def\PP{\newline\newline}%!!!not in hitachi_header but in psmacros

%----Good to know
\newcommand{\NOTE}[2][5in]{
\begin{center}
 \begin{tabularx}{#1}{lY}
   \rowcolor{ColorTableRowBackground}
   {\bfseries Note:}&
    \footnotesize #2 \normalsize  \\
   \end{tabularx}
 \end{center}
  }

\Bool{virginResp}{true}

\def\BR{%
  \setboolean{virginResp}{true}%
  \begin{quote}
    \begin{picture}(12.0,0.01)(0,0)
      \linethickness{0.015in}
      \put(-0.2,0.2){\line(1,0){12.2}}
      \put(-0.2,0.2){\line(0,-1){0.1}}
      \put(12.0,0.2){\line(0,-1){0.1}}
    \end{picture}
  %\rule{\linewidth}{1pt}
  \parskip=0.12in
  \em
  }

\def\ER{%
  \ \ \\
  %\rule{\linewidth}{2pt}
    \begin{picture}(12.0,0.01)(0,0)
      \linethickness{0.015in}
      \put(-0.2,0.0){\line(1,0){12.2}}
      \put(-0.2,0.0){\line(0,1){0.1}}
      \put(12.0,0.0){\line(0,1){0.1}}
    \end{picture}
  \end{quote}
  }

\newcommand{\RESPHEAD}[1]{%
  \mbox{}\newline%
  \setboolean{virginResp}{false}%
  \U{\textbf{\color{ColorSectionText}#1}}\mbox{}\newline}

\newcommand{\MACROHEAD}[1]{%
  \ifthenelse{\boolean{virginResp}}%
    {%
    \mbox{}\newline%
    \U{\textbf{\color{ColorSectionText}#1}}\mbox{}\newline}%
    {%
    \mbox{}\newline%
    \emph{\color{ColorSectionText}#1}\mbox{}\newline}%
  }

%-----------------------------------------------
%{Graphic macros reference}
%Takes an optional width parameter
\newcommand{\FIGURE}[3][\linewidth]{
  \begin{figure}[h!]
  \centerline{\includegraphics[width=#1]{#2}}%
  \caption{#3}
  \label{fig:#2}
  \end{figure}
  }

\def\FIGUREnowidth#1#2{
  \begin{figure}[h!]
  \centerline{\includegraphics{#1.pdf}}
  \caption{#2}
  \label{fig:#1}
  \end{figure}
  }

\def\FIGUREscale#1#2#3{
  \begin{figure}[h!]
  \centerline{\includegraphics[scale=#2]{#1.pdf}}
  \caption{#3}
  \label{fig:#1}
  \end{figure}
  }

%------in text images------------------------------------
%-- When you want to include a small pic in a line of text
\def\IMG#1{\includegraphics[height=9pt]{#1}}

%-----unlabelled screenshots-----------------------------
\newcommand{\SCREENSHOT}[2][0.9]{%
  \begin{center}%
  \includegraphics[width=#1\linewidth]{#2}%
  \end{center}% #3
  }%#1 is optional.

%-----labelled screenshots----------------------------------
\newcounter{scrCap}
\setcounter{scrCap}{0}

\newcommand{\SCREENcap}[2]%
  {
  \begin{minipage}[t]{\linewidth}
  \refstepcounter{scrCap}
  \centerline{\textbf{\thescrCap. #2:}}\vspace{0.10in}
  \centerline{\includegraphics[scale=0.50]{#1.png}}
  \end{minipage}
  }

\newcommand{\SCREENcapWidth}[3]%
  {
  \begin{minipage}[t]{\linewidth}
  \refstepcounter{scrCap}
  \centerline{\textbf{\thescrCap. #2:}}\vspace{0.10in}
  \centerline{\includegraphics[width=#3]{#1.png}}
  \end{minipage}
  }

\newcommand{\BYODcap}[2]%
  {
  \begin{minipage}[t]{0.5\linewidth}
  \refstepcounter{scrCap}
  \centerline{\textbf{\thescrCap. #2:}}\vspace{0.10in}
  \centerline{\includegraphics[scale=0.25]{#1.png}}
  \end{minipage}
  }

%-----multi-page pdf inclusions-----------------------------
\def\INCLUDEPDF#1%
  {
  % Include the first page as a graphic, so it appears under the section
  % header properly. Page 2 and on are then nicely formated by the pdfpages
  % package.
  \begin{center}
    \fbox{\includegraphics[width=6in]{#1.pdf}}
  \end{center}
  \includepdf[pages={2-},frame,width=6in,pagecommand={\pagestyle{fancy}}]%
             {#1.pdf}
  }
%DOC:\end{mytex}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%--Appendices
%%Not used in Manuals. Standard \appendix work fine.
%%
\newboolean{inAppendices}
\setboolean{inAppendices}{false}


\newcommand{\StartAppendices}%
  {
  \ifthenelse{\boolean{inAppendices}}{}%
    {
    \setboolean{inAppendices}{true}
    \appendix
    \clearpage
    \section*{}
    \mbox{}
    \vfill
    \mbox{} \hfill {\huge \bf APPENDICES} \hfill \mbox{}
    \vfill
    \mbox{}
    \addcontentsline{toc}{part}{APPENDICES}
    \clearpage
    }
  }

\newcommand{\APPENDIX}[1]%
  {
  \StartAppendices{}
  \cleardoublepage
  \phantomsection
  \bookmarksetup{level=1}
  \section{#1}
  }

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%{Cross-Referencing}

%%These macros are redundant but are included for backwards compatibility.
\def\URL#1{\href{#1}{#1}}
\def\MAIL#1{\href{mailto:#1}{#1}}

\newcommand{\FIGREF}[1]{\autoref{fig:#1}}
\newcommand{\TABREF}[1]{\autoref{tab:#1}}
\newcommand{\FIGREFP}[1]{\autoref{fig:#1} on Page~\pageref{fig:#1}}
\newcommand{\TABREFP}[1]{\autoref{tab:#1} on Page~\pageref{tab:#1}}
\newcommand{\FULLFIGREF}[1]{\autoref{fig:#1} on Page~\pageref{fig:#1}}
\newcommand{\REF}[1]{\autoref{#1}}
\newcommand{\NAMEREF}[2][]{\nameref{#1#2} in the \ExternalTitle{#1}}
\newcommand{\FULLNAMEREF}[1]{\nameref{#1} on Page~\pageref{#1}}
%next 2 redefined in idmdocs
\newcommand{\FULLREF}[2][]{\autoref{#1#2} on Page~\pageref{#1#2}}
\newcommand{\TEXTLINK}[3][]{\hyperref[#1#3]{#2 on Page~\pageref*{#1#3}}}
%%the macros in alterref are only needed if you have a set of large
%%documents that reference each other. It's kinda convoluted.

%{Tables and frames}
%Common table styles
\newcommand{\PreserveBackslash}[1]{\let\temp=\\#1\let\\=\temp}
\let\PBS=\PreserveBackslash
\newcolumntype{L}{>{\PBS\raggedright\hspace{0pt}}l}
\newcolumntype{R}{>{\PBS\raggedright\hspace{0pt}}r}
\newcolumntype{C}{>{\PBS\raggedright\hspace{0pt}}c}
\newcolumntype{Y}{>{\PBS\raggedright\hspace{0pt}\parskip=0.10in}X}
\newcolumntype{P}[1]{>{\PBS\raggedright\parskip=0.10in}p{#1}}
\newcolumntype{S}[1]{>{\PBS\centering\parskip=0.10in}p{#1}}
\newcolumntype{Z}[1]{>{\PBS\raggedleft\parskip=0.10in}p{#1}}

%sets default row height to 4pt
\newcommand{\RowHeight}[1][4pt]{\setlength{\extrarowheight}{#1}}
%adjust row height with \RowHeight[<N>pt]
\RowHeight

%section title formatting

\titleformat{\subsubsection}{\color{ColorSectionText}\large\bf}{\thesubsubsection~~}{0pt}{}[]
\titleformat{\paragraph}[display]{\color{ColorSectionText}\normalsize\bf}{}{}{}[]
\titlespacing*{\paragraph}{0pt}{-4pt}{0pt}

%--Symbols
\def\BS{{\tt \symbol{92}}}
\def\A{{\mysym\char'256}\xspace} %right arrow
\def\Star{{\large\raisebox{0pt}{$\star$}}}
\def\GBP{$\pounds$}
\def\Dagger{{\normalsize\raisebox{0pt}{$\dagger$}}}
\def\gt{$>$}
\def\lt{$<$}
\def\GT{$>$}
\def\LT{$<$}
\def\LEQ{$\leq$}
\def\GEQ{$\geq$}
%\def\BS{\textbackslash{}}
\def\LEFTBRACK{\symbol{91}}
\def\RIGHTBRACK{\symbol{93}}
\def\PIPE{$|$}
\def\CIRCUMFLEX{\texttt{\symbol{94}}}
%DOC:   \end{mytex}
% Attributed quotes:
\newcommand{\Signature}[3]%
  {%
    {%
    \setlength{\extrarowheight}{0pt}%
    \begin{tabular}{lL}%
    &\\
    --- & #1\\
        & #2\\
        & #3%
    \end{tabular}
    }
  }


%-----------------------------------------------

%{Control macros}
%These macros are used with other text macros.

% To capitalize the first letter of a string of text that is
% usually lowercase, precede it with \Capitalize.
% \Capitalize\auth{}s review requests. 
% if that fails try:
% \Capitalize{\auths{}} review requests.
%----------------------------------------------------------
\makeatletter
\DeclareRobustCommand\Capitalize[1]%
  {\protected@edef\cpt@mp{\protect\MakeUppercase #1}\cpt@mp}
\makeatother


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\newcommand{\HasNonEmptyValue}[3]{%  macro name, ifdef clause, ifndef clause
  \ifcsname#1\endcsname%
    \def\argValue{\csname#1\endcsname}%
    \setbox0=\hbox{\argValue\unskip}\ifdim\wd0=0pt%
      #3%
    \else%
      #2%
    \fi%
  \else%
    #3%
  \fi%
  }

\newlength{\saveparskip}
\newcommand{\BMiniPage}%
  {%
  \setlength{\saveparskip}{\parskip}%
  \begin{minipage}[t]{\linewidth}%
  \setlength{\parskip}{\saveparskip}%
  }
\newcommand{\EMiniPage}%
  {%
  \end{minipage}%
  }

\def\FIGUREX#1#2#3{
  \begin{figure}[h!]
  \centerline{\includegraphics[width=#2]{#1}}
  \caption{#3}
  \label{fig:#1}
  \end{figure}
  }

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%% store and retrieve values.
\makeatletter%
\newcommand{\SetSectionName}[1]%
  {%
  \def\@currentlabel{#1}%
  }
\newcommand{\StoreKeyPair}[2]%
  {%
  \def\@currentlabel{#2}%
  \label{#1}%
  }
\makeatother%
